name: The Incantation
description:
You're a man with a mysterious mission, trapped in a room where magical portals lead to giant enemies ready to kill you. But you must find a way to overcome these obstacles, since the only way to leave is to complete the incantation. Choose your challenges wisely, since each time you face the same foe, he'll become stronger. And beware, there's a lot of different ways the incantation might finish, depending on your choices.

This was the first game ever made by:
.Marco Vito Oddo (Mother Serpent) - Design and Programming
.Vitor Ornelas - Music and Sound Effects
.Enzo Antun - Sprites

Under the orientation of:
.Stealthix - Programming support and additional sprites
